title: No chest for S rank
body: I have gotten several S ranks for the first time this season on champions that I own with no chest to show for it.  Is there some other requirement that I'm missing?

replies.body: Can you provide match history links for these matches so I can look into this for ya? ^.^

Yeah at least a couple, not sure if I'll pull the right games.  The champs I have in my pool with an S rank and no chest are Rengar, Zed, Ryze, Twitch, Viktor, Leblanc, Warwick, Orianna, and Malzahar.

Leblanc Game: http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2429107522/226123764?tab=overview

Orianna Game http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2407944628/226123764?tab=overview

Malzahar Game: http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2429109411/226123764?tab=overview

I've earned most of these on ARAM and on my first game for most champs this season I got a chest but not the ones listed.

I took a look at your account and it seems you didn't have a chest available during these matches. You can always check how many chests you have available to earn and how long you have to wait for the next chest to become available on your **Profile** in the client. You'll see a hextech chest that lists how many chests you have available and how long you need to wait for the next chest (if you hover over it).

https://imgur.com/a/b5K8q

Check out our [**Hextech Crafting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for more information. Let me know if you have any other questions.
Thanks for the info! I didn't know there was a chest timer but that answers my question thanks!
These are on ARAM and I've experienced not getting chests when getting s on ARAM.
I have a lot of champs that I've only played on ARAM that I've gotten the chests for like Graves and Jarvan IV
